--- create_table_cluster_and_row_deletion_policy.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
  bar int64,
  baz timestamp,
) primary key (),
  interleave in parent foobar,
  row deletion policy ( older_than ( baz, INTERVAL 30 DAY ) )

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Create:      0,
  Rparen:      77,
  IfNotExists: false,
  Name:        &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 16,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Hidden:        -1,
      Options:       (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 34,
        NameEnd: 37,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 38,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Hidden:        -1,
      Options:       (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 47,
        NameEnd: 50,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 51,
        Name:    "TIMESTAMP",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Hidden:        -1,
      Options:       (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
  },
  TableConstraints: []*ast.TableConstraint(nil),
  PrimaryKeys:      []*ast.IndexKey(nil),
  Synonyms:         []*ast.Synonym(nil),
  Cluster:          &ast.Cluster{
    Comma:       78,
    OnDeleteEnd: -1,
    TableName:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 103,
      NameEnd: 109,
      Name:    "foobar",
    },
    OnDelete: "",
  },
  RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy{
    Comma:             109,
    RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.RowDeletionPolicy{
      Row:        113,
      Rparen:     171,
      ColumnName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 148,
        NameEnd: 151,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      NumDays: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 162,
        ValueEnd: 164,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "30",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64, bar INT64, baz TIMESTAMP) PRIMARY KEY (), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT foobar, ROW DELETION POLICY ( OLDER_THAN ( baz, INTERVAL 30 DAY ))
